title: Project Kick-off Meeting
description: Initial meeting to discuss project scope, timeline, and resources required. This includes the following agenda items: objectives, requirements gathering, risk identification, and resource allocation.

title: Requirements Gathering and Documentation
description: Collect user stories and functional requirements for the NeuralInterfaceEnergyOptimizer.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall architecture of the NeuralInterfaceEnergyOptimizer system.

title: User Interface Design
description: Design the user interface for intuitive interaction with smart home systems.

title: Brain-Computer Interface Design
description: Design the brain-computer interface component for thought control.

title: Smart Home System Integration Design
description: Design the integration of the NeuralInterfaceEnergyOptimizer with smart home systems.

title: Database Design
description: Design the database schema for storing user data and usage patterns.

title: Implement Brain-Computer Interface
description: Develop the brain-computer interface using machine learning models.

title: Implement User Interface
description: Develop the user interface based on design specifications.

title: Implement Smart Home System Integration
description: Develop the integration of NeuralInterfaceEnergyOptimizer with smart home systems.

title: Integrate Database
description: Develop the database integration for data storage and retrieval.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Perform testing of the NeuralInterfaceEnergyOptimizer system.

title: Deployment Planning
description: Plan for the deployment of the NeuralInterfaceEnergyOptimizer system. This includes strategy for rollout, infrastructure requirements, contingency plans, and a timeline for each phase. Consider factors such as user experience, scalability, security, compliance, and integration with existing smart home systems. Upon completion, provide a detailed deployment plan, including all necessary technical documentation.

title: Deployment Execution
description: Execute the deployment of the NeuralInterfaceEnergyOptimizer system according to the approved Deployment Plan. Implement necessary checks for smooth and efficient deployment, including performance optimizations, error handling, security measures, and consider integration with existing smart home systems if feasible. Prepare a detailed plan for post-deployment monitoring, maintenance, and updates, focusing on user experience, scalability, resilience, and compatibility. Collaborate with DevOps and QA teams to ensure seamless deployment and testing processes. Document the deployment process, including any deviations or learnings, for future reference. If necessary, work closely with other teams (e.g., frontend, backend, database) to address potential integration issues. Update the rfc_state field when ready for next state.
